mapper.insert: insert into products_table (sno, pno, p_name, p_inst, p_category, p_type, p_startDate, p_endDate, p_price) values(#{sno}, products_seq.nextval, #{p_name}, #{p_inst}, #{p_category}, #{p_type}, #{p_startDate}, #{p_endDate}, #{p_price})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM products_table WHERE p_name LIKE '%' || #{p_name} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products_table where p_category=#{p_category}
mapper.insert: insert into products_inquiry (ino, pno,sno, u_id , p_name, u_name,i_title, u_inquiry, inquiry_date , status) values (inquiry_seq.nextval, #{pno},#{sno},#{u_id}, #{p_name}, #{u_name}, #{i_title}, #{u_inquiry}, #{inquiry_date},'답변 대기')
mapper.update: update products_inquiry set i_title = #{i_title}, u_inquiry = #{u_inquiry} , inquiry_date= #{inquiry_date} where ino = #{ino}
update products_inquiry set status = '답변 완료' where ino = #{ino}
mapper.insert: insert into b_inquiry (bno ,ino,sno, b_answer, b_id, pno, status,sys_date ) values (b_inquiry_seq.nextval, #{ino},#{sno},#{b_answer},#{b_id},#{pno},'답변 완료',#{sys_date})
